Introduction

Ahn Hee-yeon, better known by her stage name Hani, is a South Korean singer, dancer, actress, and television personality. She is known as the lead dancer, lead vocalist, and visual of the South Korean girl group EXID and its sub-group, Soljihani.

Hani is now signed under Sublime Agency after leaving Banana Culture in late May 2019.
